configuration.name: Run E2E test suite in Docker

option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: echo "Building containers..."; docker compose down --remove-orphans; docker compose build; echo "Starting containers..."; docker compose up -d pgsql; docker compose up -d nullops; docker compose run --entrypoint "" -d nullops-testsuite tail -f /dev/null; echo "Executing tests..."; docker compose exec nullops-testsuite /app/NullOps.Tests.E2ESuite; docker compose down --remove-orphans;
